attributes.action: Create a west midlands/ Birmingham transgender nhs clinic.
attributes.additional_details:
With the government's assistant it can be built as it would be an nhs facility. One where educated doctors can help the queer individuals in the area.
Grants, building permission and hearty catalogue of doctors.
attributes.background: I want a nhs transgender clinic in the west midlands to serve the high volume of trans individuals in Birmingham and surrounding areas.  At the moment individuals have to choose between London and Nottingham and thats HOURS of travel, thats not fair or easy accessible. So I say let's build one.
